overview: Well, your search has ended!  Get a heapin' helping of some of the strangest sexual appetites on the face of the planet! We've built this collection from the ground-up with plenty of pudding-poppin' scenes that are sure to maximize your meat mallet!  No matter what your particular tastes my be, there's plenty for the "freak" in everyone to enjoy in The World of Sexual Variations #2!
tagline: Not everyone plays the same games
title: The World of Sexual Variations 2
